channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLhealthAndWellness
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLhealthAndWellness, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Eczema symptoms unchanged by daily or weekly bathing, study shows
item.description: A study has found that people with eczema are able to bathe either daily or weekly, without any impact on their symptoms.
